ZHСash Wallet in Your Browser

PHOTON is an extension for accessing decentralized applications supported by the ZHСash blockchain, or "Dapps", in your regular Chrome browser!

With the extension, you will be able to read data from the ZHСash blockchain, send and sign transactions, and connect to third-party Dapps.
